section_full_path: Sign up > New Onboarding > Fast-track signup
title: Verify Pro is able to complete onboarding flow with fast-track request created

custom_steps_separated.content: Launch app and tap "Create account" -> Enter "first name", "last name", phone number", and/or "Email address" -> Tap "Next"

In AdminPortal, create a "fast-track request" object for the user
https://admin.example.com/positions/fasttrack/

Pro kills and relaunches the app
OR
Pro re-logs in to the account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Pro should be redirected to the new onboarding flow and land on "Let's add your profile photo" screen.
With REQUIRE_PROFILE_IMAGE_UPLOAD enabled, photo is now mandatory during onboarding
"Next" button is only visible AFTER a photo was added.

  ![](index.php?/attachments/get/bcd12345-0000-1111-2222-333333333301) ![](index.php?/attachments/get/bcd12345-0000-1111-2222-333333333302)

custom_steps_separated.content: Pro proceed to complete the whole onboarding flow until the "Contractor Service Agreement" screen
On "Contractor Service Agreement" screen, scroll down to the bottom and tap "I agree and accept"

Pro should land on "You're approved!" screen with "Account created successfully" green toast on top and "Book your first shift" CTA at the bottom

Pro can tap on <- or "Book your first shift" CTA

Note: currently no requested position showing on this screen due to this bug: https://project-tracker.example.com/tasks/45681

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/bcd12345-0000-1111-2222-333333333303)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
If  "Find people you may know on Instawork" screen is presented, tap <- to proceed to the "Open shifts" screen

Expected result: "Find people you may know on Instawork" screen should be removed
This will be improved along in this ticket: https://project-tracker.example.com/tasks/45682

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/bcd12345-0000-1111-2222-333333333304) 


Pro should be redirected to "Open shifts" screen
 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/bcd12345-0000-1111-2222-333333333305)

AdminPortal:

Check user profile object: account status should be "active"
Pro app

The 6 entry-level positions should be auto-approved

 ![](index.php?/attachments/get/bcd12345-0000-1111-2222-333333333306)
